00013 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00015    TreeField * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new TreeField) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    variable->setHorizontallyScrollable(horizontallyScrollable); \
00023    variable->setVerticallyScrollable(verticallyScrollable); \
00024    variable->setType(TreeField::TYPE_##type);
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00027    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00028    GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00029       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00030    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00031 
00032 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00033    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00034    GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00035       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00036    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00037       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00038 
00039 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00040    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00041    GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00042       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00043    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00044    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00045       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00046 
00047 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00048    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00049    GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00050       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00051    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00052    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00053 
00054 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00055    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00056    GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00057       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00058    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00059    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \

00061

00070 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_PSM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \

00078 
00079 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_ITEM(variable, field, parentItem) \
00080    TreeField::Item * variable; \
00081    if ((variable = new TreeField::Item) == NULL) \
00082       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00083    if ((parentItem) != NULL) \
00084       ((TreeField::Item *) (parentItem))->appendChild(variable); \
00085    else \
00086       (field)->appendRoot(variable);
00087 
00088 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_TEXTELEMENT(variable, item, text) \
00089    TextElement * variable; \
00090    if ((variable = new TextElement) == NULL) \
00091       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00092    item->appendElement(variable); \
00093    variable->setText(text);
00094 
00095 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_IMAGEELEMENT(variable, item, image) \
00096    ImageElement * variable; \
00097    if ((variable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00098       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00099    item->appendElement(variable); \
00100    variable->setImage(image);
00101 
00102 #define GLAZIERY_TREEFIELD_IMAGEELEMENT_I(variable, item, imageId) \
00103    ImageElement * variable; \
00104    if ((variable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00105       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00106    item->appendElement(variable); \
00107    variable->setImageId(imageId);
